short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful image conversion tool for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ImageConvert Pro is a powerful and versatile Chrome extension that transforms how you work with images on the web. With just a few clicks, you can capture, convert, and optimize images directly in your browser.

Key features:
• Capture full webpage screenshots instantly
• Convert images between popular formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
• Resize images to custom dimensions
• Adjust image quality to balance size and appearance  
• Extract all images from the current webpage
• Preview conversions before downloading

Whether you're a designer needing quick image edits, a content creator optimizing graphics, or just someone who likes to save and share images, ImageConvert Pro streamlines your workflow. No need to switch between multiple apps or websites - do it all right in Chrome.

The intuitive interface makes image tasks simple:
1. Capture a screenshot or select an image
2. Choose your desired format, size, and quality
3. Preview and download the converted image

Install ImageConvert Pro today to save time and hassle when working with images online. Transform any webpage image into the perfect format and size for your needs, all without leaving your browser.
